options.title: -a, --all
options.description: include pseudo, duplicate, inaccessible file systems

options.title: -a, --all
options.description: include pseudo, duplicate, inaccessible file systems

options.title: -B, --block-size=SIZE
options.description: scale sizes by SIZE before printing them; e.g., '-BM' prints sizes in units of 1,048,576 bytes; see SIZE format below

options.title: -B, --block-size=SIZE
options.description: scale sizes by SIZE before printing them; e.g., '-BM' prints sizes in units of 1,048,576 bytes; see SIZE format below

options.title: -h, --human-readable
options.description: print sizes in powers of 1024 (e.g., 1023M)

options.title: -h, --human-readable
options.description: print sizes in powers of 1024 (e.g., 1023M)

options.title: -H, --si
options.description: print sizes in powers of 1000 (e.g., 1.1G)

options.title: -H, --si
options.description: print sizes in powers of 1000 (e.g., 1.1G)

options.title: -i, --inodes
options.description: list inode information instead of block usage

options.title: -i, --inodes
options.description: list inode information instead of block usage

options.title: -k
options.description: like --block-size=1K

options.title: -l, --local
options.description: limit listing to local file systems

options.title: -l, --local
options.description: limit listing to local file systems

options.title: --no-sync
options.description: do not invoke sync before getting usage info (default)

options.title: --output[=FIELD_LIST]
options.description: use the output format defined by FIELD_LIST, or print all fields if FIELD_LIST is omitted.

options.title: -P, --portability
options.description: use the POSIX output format

options.title: -P, --portability
options.description: use the POSIX output format

options.title: --sync
options.description: invoke sync before getting usage info

options.title: --total
options.description: elide all entries insignificant to available space, and produce a grand total

options.title: -t, --type=TYPE
options.description: limit listing to file systems of type TYPE

options.title: -t, --type=TYPE
options.description: limit listing to file systems of type TYPE

options.title: -T, --print-type
options.description: print file system type

options.title: -T, --print-type
options.description: print file system type

options.title: -x, --exclude-type=TYPE
options.description: limit listing to file systems not of type TYPE

options.title: -x, --exclude-type=TYPE
options.description: limit listing to file systems not of type TYPE

options.title: -v
options.description: (ignored)

options.title: --help
options.description: display this help and exit

options.title: --version
options.description: output version information and exit
